title: Annual Art Exhibition
description: Our prestigious annual art exhibition showcasing the talents of our students and faculty.

title: Spring Music Festival
description: Join us for a night of enchanting melodies and live performances by renowned musicians.

description: A symposium featuring talks and workshops by leading experts in the fields of science and technology.

description: Celebrate the rich tapestry of cultures at our collage with traditional food, dance, and exhibits.
